summary: A kidnapped diver is taken to an island inhabited by a mad scientist and his half-animal, half-human creations.
cast: John Ashley|Pat Woodell|Jan Merlin|Charles Macaulay|Pam Grier|Ken Metcalfe|Tony Gosalvez|Kim Ramos|Mona Morena|Eddie Garcia|Angelo Ventura|Johnny Long|Andres Centenera|Letty Mirasol|Max Roio|Cenón González|Roger Ocampo|Romeo Mabuto|Vic Unson
title: Los hombres del ocaso
